subject: Status order
description_text:
Hello , just wanted to ask about the status of my order : SSN5373

Thank you very much and have a nice day :)

Daniel Vodňaruk

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Vodňaruk,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hi , that's undetstandble. Thank you very much for the information.

Have a nice day :)

Daniel Vodňaruk


Dne pá 16. 1. 2026 2:56 uživatel service@simsonn.com
Hi Daniel Vodňaruk,  ​Thank you for your understanding. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will reply as soon as possible.
